definition: not as expected, an account of an amusing incident, usually with a punch line
details:
adjective
- not as expected
= synonyms: shady
- experiencing odd bodily sensations
= example: experiencing odd bodily sensations
- beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
= synonyms: odd
- arousing or provoking laughter
= synonyms: amusing, comic, comical, laughable, mirthful, risible
noun
- an account of an amusing incident, usually with a punch line
= example: an account of an amusing incident, usually with a punch line
= synonyms: funny story, good story, funny remark
